Subject: [Slightly OT] Software Architecture Discuss?

Where do practical discussions of software architecture take place?  I
mean, this is a great group for discussing a single architectural
style - even if its focus tends to be on implementation of a style -
but do you know of any good outlets for discussion of styles
themselves?

Thanks,
--tim
